title: Musical Instruments: Graphical Representation
question_text:
PianoGuitarViolinFluteNone
Private School2097122
Public School830183


The data summarized in the two-way chart above reflect the results of asking $50$ students in a public school and $50$ students in a private school what musical instrument they had learned to play.
In cases where students had learned to play more than one instrument, they were instructed to choose the instrument they had played for the longest amount of time.
Which kind of graphical representation would best compare this data?

choices.text: Any of these charts would adequately compare this data.
